name: Feed the Frog (aquafroq)
description:
(Not a game)

A year ago, you finally achieved your dream of becoming a baker, opening a donut shop in the middle of the bustling city. It's everything you could've ever wanted. The locals are nice, your donuts are good, you're turning a decent profit.

If anyone were to ask, you'd say you're pretty happy with your life right now. 

But what's this? This funny frog has made its home on the counter and is demanding nummies and scaring away the regulars. Maybe if you feed it enough, it'll go away. Or maybe it'll eat you out of house and home.

(Developer's note: nothing happens when you feed the frog a lot, at least for the time being.)
